Posts.EditableText: Hi I have recently downloaded Quest to create a new game, I must say I am impressed with it overall. It has sparked memories of G A C which was around at the time of the commodore 64. It's got the old brainbox ticking again. Well done Alex for sticking with this genre. I thought it was a thing of the past until I accidentally came across it. Please could you tell me how I can run an individual location. Example ( if I want to run the fifth location to check for any anomalies have I really got to start from the first location and go through the various levels to get there. Once again Keep up the good work.

You want to jump to a specific loaction? This can be done with 

[code:2m32m6rp]player.parent=name_of_location[/code:2m32m6rp]
